titleStmt.title: The grand question resolved, what we must do to be saved instructions for a holy life / by the late Reverend Divine, Mr. Richard Baxter ; recommended to the bookseller a few days before his death to be immediately printed for the good of souls.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Later published as: What we must do to be saved.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
